dcterms:creator: T. Pedersen
S. V. Pakhomov
S. Patwardhan
dcterms:description: A dataset measuring semantic similarity and relatedness in the biomedical domain, containing concept pairs with an annotation scale from 1 to 10.
dcterms:title: MayoSRS

dcterms:creator: S. V. Pakhomov
T. Pedersen
B. McInnes
dcterms:description: A dataset for developing semantic relatedness reference standards in the biomedical domain, containing concept pairs with an annotation scale from 0 to 1600.
dcterms:title: UMNSRS-Rel

dcterms:creator: S. V. Pakhomov
T. Pedersen
B. McInnes
dcterms:description: A dataset for developing semantic similarity reference standards in the biomedical domain, containing concept pairs with an annotation scale from 0 to 1600.
dcterms:title: UMNSRS-Sim

dcterms:creator: C. Schulz
J. Levy-Kramer
C. Van Assel
dcterms:description: The largest publicly available relatedness dataset based on electronic health records (EHR), containing concept pairs that frequently co-occur in EHRs, with 89% of terms being multi-word.
dcterms:title: EHR-RelB
